entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @NYGovCuomo Hey @NYGovCuomo: True, but you left out hypocrisy. For example, you discredited yourself by allowing outdoor protests, while banning other peaceful outdoor gatherings in the middle of a pandemic. Hypocrisy helps #COVID19 and your hypocrisy hurt us all.
